title: The Princess and Curdie
description: A classic story of magic, mystery, and adventure in a fairy-tale world.Princess Ireneâ€™s great-great-grandmother has a testing task for Curdie. Curdie will not go alone though; she provides him with a companion, the oddest and ugliest creature Curdie has ever seen, but one who turns out to be the most loyal friend he could have hoped for.
author: George MacDonald
